definition: to meet a contingency/to adapt oneself to changes
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to change according to the situation (idiom); pragmatic
adaptability/resourcefulness
emergency management

sentences.english: A path independent of the J-integral and the stress, strain on the crack tip are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了J积分的路径无关性和裂尖应力，应变奇异性。

sentences.english: Globalisation has made markets more responsive and flexible.
sentences.chinese: 受全球化影响，市场越来越灵活应变。

sentences.english: The higher the volume fraction, the lower the proportion of yield strain is.
sentences.chinese: 骨小梁的体积比越高，达到降伏应变的比例就越小。

sentences.english: This is, in effect, the essence of the on demand computing principle.
sentences.chinese: 就其本质而言，这实际上就是随需应变的计算原则。

sentences.english: The strain-fatigue-life of materials is related to the plastic strain at the crack-tip.
sentences.chinese: 材料的应变疲劳寿命与裂端的塑性应变有关。

sentences.english: The strain-fatigue-life of materials is related to the plastic strain at the crack-tip.
sentences.chinese: 材料的应变疲劳寿命与裂端的塑性应变有关。

sentences.english: A digitally precisely controlled motor can vary test frequency and strain over a wide range.
sentences.chinese: 高精度数控马达在大范围内改变侧试频率和应变。

sentences.english: Strong individual working capability, flexibility plus team-oriented spirit.
sentences.chinese: 具备强的独立工作和应变能力，同时又有团队精神。

sentences.english: In the paper, the frequency response of strainmeter is derived.
sentences.chinese: 本文推导了应变仪的频率特性。

sentences.english: The constant shear strain point accounting for the degradation of stiffness was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对考虑刚度劣化时的常剪切应变点进行了讨论。

sentences.english: Lastly, business integration is one of the cornerstones of an on demand business.
sentences.chinese: 最后，业务集成是随需应变业务的基础之一。

sentences.english: The strain gage based on mechanical principles is the scratch gage .
sentences.chinese: 以机械原理为基础的应变计是刻痕应变计。

sentences.english: The strain gage based on mechanical principles is the scratch gage .
sentences.chinese: 以机械原理为基础的应变计是刻痕应变计。

sentences.english: This paper puts forward a method for measuring object's surface strain by holographic interferometry.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用全息干涉术测量物体表面应变的一种方法。
情况有变，我们就该随机应变。

sentences.english: In addition, China has an emergency-response mechanism in place for its nuclear power plants, he said.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在中国拥有的核电厂发生紧急应变机制，他说。

definition: to change according to the situation (idiom); pragmatic
to face the enemy/to meet an attack
just before the contest/on the eve of war
to make a decision/resolution/decisiveness/resolute
improvisation/flexible/adaptable/pragmatic
situation/circumstance
response/to answer/to reply
to advance or retreat/knowing when to come and when to leave/a sense of propriety
to make a move (in martial arts or figuratively)
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
countermeasure for dealing with a situation
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
just before the battle/to approach the front line
to wait for the opportune moment before taking action (idiom)
to remain calm in the face of events (idiom)
